{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3579888,"name":"Mert Ata BABER","username":"BABER","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/baber/{size}/173331_2.png","created_at":"2025-04-04T10:19:43.907Z","cooked":"

Mod edit per user request:

We want to inform you that the public version of Quick Attendance will officially reach its End-of-Life (EOL) on May 6, 2025 .

Hi CD,

Quick Attendance Software for FRC

Quick Attendance is an efficient and easy-to-use software designed for FRC teams to streamline attendance tracking. The system works by generating a unique QR code on the admin’s screen that resets every 11 seconds. Students simply scan the QR code using their smartphones, instantly marking their attendance.

Now after completing 100 user Alpha testing. Beta Version is ready for all teams to try. Please keep in mind Beta version might have unknown/unforseen bugs. Works with both IOS and Android based devices.

Key Features:

  • Fast & Contactless: No need for manual check-ins; just scan and go.
  • QR Code Generation: A dynamic QR code appears on the team admin’s screen, which students scan to record their attendance.
  • Instant Record Keeping: Attendance data is automatically logged and stored for easy access.
  • Team Management: Helps mentors keep track of team participation and engagement.
  • Free
  • CSV User Import: Import without actually uploading the file. Just select the file and system will scan it for you.

What do you need to use it?

  • Students: A phone, tablet, or computer with a camera capable of scanning a QR code and a stable internet connection.
  • Mentors/Coaches: A phone, tablet, or computer to display the QR code for students, along with a stable internet connection.

How does it work?

Student:

See it in action

Android:
IN ACTION
IOS:
IPAD

Team Admin:

See Videos

dispplayqr
add_std

How to Sign Up?

To comply with age restrictions and Data Protection Laws, children under 13 and California teams are not allowed to register. Only team admins can import student data via a CSV file. A default password chosen by the team admin will be assigned to all students which they will be forced to change on their first login.

Self-registration is not allowed for mentors, coaches, or students. If your team wants to use the system, a mentor should DM me to receive their team admin credentials.
Team admins are allowed to reset their own passwords. Student password can be reset by the team admin.(See upcoming feature list below.)
Students can change their password from their profile page if they remember their current password.

Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) is highly recommended for both mentors and students.

User Roles & Permissions

User Group Permissions
Team Admins Display QR codes, edit student and teacher information, add/remove attendance manually.
Students View their own attendance records and scan QR codes.

User Interface Screenshots

Team Admin Dashboard:

See Screenshots

image1919×871 37.1 KB

image1918×876 62.2 KB

image1919×872 21.6 KB

image1918×884 56 KB

image1919×878 85.9 KB

image1919×876 42.3 KB

Student Dashboard:

See Screenshots

image1919×885 55.7 KB

image1919×868 159 KB

image1915×864 66.5 KB

image1916×870 105 KB

Known bugs:

  • If QR is scanned as soon it gets generated and server is behind the clock, it might send out a warning saying invalid QR. Incase this happens, please re-scan the QR.
  • Password reset has a hourly limit. If the quota is exceeded, reset mails won’t be sent. You can retry the next hour. Fix is pending until we find a hosting with higher limit. (Patch applied for team admins)
  • Only one team admin can display QR code. (Already solved and patch will be applied next version.)

Upcoming Features:

  • “Limited team admin” group that can only generate QR and add manual attendance.
  • “Parent” user group.
  • “School” user group to see all attendance of teams affiliated with them.
  • TC Kimlik based self registration for Turk users.
  • Full Turkish translation.
  • UI rework.
  • Option to assign one team admin to multiple teams.
  • Region based datacenters to for faster access. (Currently Dallas,TX,USA)
  • Student self password reset (This depends on 2. bug in the list above.)

Note:

  • We tried to make it run with as low data as possible.
    We only store E-mail adress, name, surname and username, password (encrypted),cookies and IP Adress(only for security reasons), team name|number. No analytics or ads.
  • Region selector does not currently work until feature 8 is introduced. You may select whichever one you want until then.

For all support requests please reach us at : support@quickattendance.com

Yes, we know UI is not our thing. 3 Backend devs and AI made the Frontend. We will remake the UI.

BABER:

To comply with age restrictions and Data Protection Laws, children under 13 and California teams are not allowed to register

Wondering which laws, or software features, prevent California teams from registering?

","post_number":2,"post_type":1,"posts_count":8,"updated_at":"2025-04-04T13:35:35.534Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":1,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":319,"readers_count":318,"score":68.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":497989,"topic_slug":"introducing-quick-attendance-qr-based-attendance-system-beta-release","display_username":"Tom","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":14980,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"4276 nice mentor"},"post_url":"/t/introducing-quick-attendance-qr-based-attendance-system-beta-release/497989/2","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3579970,"name":"Mert Ata BABER","username":"BABER","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/baber/{size}/173331_2.png","created_at":"2025-04-04T13:39:47.903Z","cooked":"

We’re sorry for the inconvenience. It’s not the law itself that prevents us from allowing registration, but rather the fact that we’re not familiar with California’s data protection laws—such as the CCPA and CPRA (e.g., “Do not sell my data” requirements). We don’t want to risk any potential legal issues due to unintentional non-compliance.

We’ve previously developed apps for the EU and Türkiye, so we’re well-acquainted with GDPR and KVKK. However, none of us currently have a solid understanding of California’s specific regulations.

We truly appreciate your understanding, and we’re sorry we can’t offer broader support at this time.

New features added:

  • If more than 1 student didn’t sign out by themselves using the QR, now instead of using Record Manual Attendance, team admins can record sign out attendance for all students at once with a single button click.

  • A little UI tweak was made for team admins.

    Screenshot 2025-04-06 at 01-48-58 Team Admin Dashboard - Quick Attendance System1917×903 48.6 KB

  • Dashboard UI is now complete and will be patched shortly.

    Screenshot 2025-04-06 at 02-04-13 Team Admin Dashboard - Quick Attendance System1920×878 46 KB

Dark mode added to team admin dashboard.

Screenshot 2025-04-26 at 22-04-02 Team Admin Dashboard - Quick Attendance System1906×853 44.1 KB

Inventory management feature is going to be added to the system with the next major version.

Users might experience down time during the development of inventory management. We do not have an ETA.

  • Why we are adding this to an attendance system?
    Because we need it as a team so why not make it available to all users of Quick Attendance.

Screenshot 2025-04-26 at 21-53-40 Inventory Management - Team 12341910×878 47.8 KB

image1907×857 62.2 KB

Support is avaliable between 10AM-10PM GMT+3.

","post_number":6,"post_type":1,"posts_count":8,"updated_at":"2025-04-26T19:44:18.165Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":144,"readers_count":143,"score":38.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":497989,"topic_slug":"introducing-quick-attendance-qr-based-attendance-system-beta-release","display_username":"Rich Jr","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":6998,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"FRC 271 | Lead Mentor | Fabworks Discount Code: FRC271"},"post_url":"/t/introducing-quick-attendance-qr-based-attendance-system-beta-release/497989/6","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3604680,"name":"Mert Ata BABER","username":"BABER","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/baber/{size}/173331_2.png","created_at":"2025-04-26T19:52:47.814Z","cooked":"

We were planning to open source it a few versions ago, but the current version is being configured to run across multiple servers. We will need to create a version that runs on a single server and database.
Currently, user data, system settings, and attendance logs are distributed across different databases.
I can’t make any promises, but if we have enough time to create a standalone version, we might still open source it.

End-of-Life (EOL) Notice for Quick Attendance

“Currently registered teams may continue using the system and receive new updates if they wish. Please send me a direct message if would like to keep your account active.”

We want to inform you that the public version of Quick Attendance will officially reach its End-of-Life (EOL) on May 6, 2025.

After thorough evaluation, we have made the difficult decision to sunset the public platform due to the following reasons:

  • Zero active external users
  • High costs of maintaining multiple servers for no active external users
  • Technical complexity in scaling the platform to accommodate multiple teams

As a result, we will be continuing to operate and develop Quick Attendance solely for internal use by our team as it is no longer sustainable on a public scale.

Key Changes:

  • Starting May 6, 2025, public access to our website will be region-blocked.
  • Data Deletion: All trial account user data will be permanently deleted in 3 days.
  • Open Source Release: The beta-1 version source code (as shown in our initial post screenshots) will be shared publicly soon.

We’re proud of what we created and thankful to everyone who explored or tested the platform.

If you have any questions, please reach out to us directly here or at support@quickattendance.com .

Sincerely,
Quick Attendance Team
